133std::unique_ptr<PatchKernel> VolUnstructured::clone() const
134{
135 return std::unique_ptr<VolUnstructured>(new VolUnstructured(*this));
136}

151
158double VolUnstructured::evalCellVolume(long id) const
159{
160 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
161
162 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
163 std::size_t nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
164 BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(vertexCoordinates, std::array<double BITPIT_COMMA 3>, nCellVertices, ReferenceElementInfo::MAX_ELEM_VERTICES);
165 getVertexCoords(nCellVertices, cellVertexIds.data(), vertexCoordinates);
166
167 if (isThreeDimensional()) {
168 return cell.evalVolume(vertexCoordinates);
169 } else {
170 return cell.evalArea(vertexCoordinates);
171 }
172}
173
180double VolUnstructured::evalCellSize(long id) const
181{
182 const Cell &cell = getCell(id);
183
184 ConstProxyVector<long> cellVertexIds = cell.getVertexIds();
185 std::size_t nCellVertices = cellVertexIds.size();
186 BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(vertexCoordinates, std::array<double BITPIT_COMMA 3>, nCellVertices, ReferenceElementInfo::MAX_ELEM_VERTICES);
187 getVertexCoords(nCellVertices, cellVertexIds.data(), vertexCoordinates);
188
189 return cell.evalSize(vertexCoordinates);
190}
191
198double VolUnstructured::evalInterfaceArea(long id) const
199{
200 const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
201
202 ConstProxyVector<long> interfaceVertexIds = interface.getVertexIds();
203 std::size_t nInterfaceVertices = interfaceVertexIds.size();
204 BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(vertexCoordinates, std::array<double BITPIT_COMMA 3>, nInterfaceVertices, ReferenceElementInfo::MAX_ELEM_VERTICES);
205 getVertexCoords(nInterfaceVertices, interfaceVertexIds.data(), vertexCoordinates);
206
207 if (isThreeDimensional()) {
208 return interface.evalArea(vertexCoordinates);
209 } else {
210 return interface.evalLength(vertexCoordinates);
211 }
212}
213
220std::array<double, 3> VolUnstructured::evalInterfaceNormal(long id) const
221{
222 const Interface &interface = getInterface(id);
223
224 ConstProxyVector<long> interfaceVertexIds = interface.getVertexIds();
225 std::size_t nInterfaceVertices = interfaceVertexIds.size();
226 BITPIT_CREATE_WORKSPACE(vertexCoordinates, std::array<double BITPIT_COMMA 3>, nInterfaceVertices, ReferenceElementInfo::MAX_ELEM_VERTICES);
227 getVertexCoords(nInterfaceVertices, interfaceVertexIds.data(), vertexCoordinates);
228
229 std::array<double, 3> orientation = {{0., 0., 0.}};
230 if (!isThreeDimensional()) {
231 long ownerId = interface.getOwner();
232 const Cell &owner = getCell(ownerId);
233
234 ConstProxyVector<long> ownerVertexIds = owner.getVertexIds();
235 const int nOwnerVertices = ownerVertexIds.size();
236
237 const std::array<double, 3> &V_A = getVertex(ownerVertexIds[0]).getCoords();
238 const std::array<double, 3> &V_B = getVertex(ownerVertexIds[1]).getCoords();
239 const std::array<double, 3> &V_Z = getVertex(ownerVertexIds[nOwnerVertices - 1]).getCoords();
240
241 orientation = crossProduct(V_B - V_A, V_Z - V_A);
242 }
243
244 return interface.evalNormal(vertexCoordinates, orientation);
245}
246
252int VolUnstructured::_getDumpVersion() const
253{
254 const int DUMP_VERSION = 2;
255
256 return DUMP_VERSION;
257}
258
264void VolUnstructured::_dump(std::ostream &stream) const
265{
266 // Dump certices
267 dumpVertices(stream);
268
269 // Dump cells
270 dumpCells(stream);
271
272 // Dump cells
273 dumpInterfaces(stream);
274}
275
281void VolUnstructured::_restore(std::istream &stream)
282{
283 // Restore certices
284 restoreVertices(stream);
285
286 // Restore cells
287 restoreCells(stream);
288
289 // Restore cells
290 restoreInterfaces(stream);
291}

299bool VolUnstructured::isPointInside(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
300{
301 BITPIT_UNUSED(point);
302
303 throw std::runtime_error ("The function 'isPointInside' is not implemented yet");
304
305 return false;
306}
307
315bool VolUnstructured::isPointInside(long id, const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
316{
317 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
318 BITPIT_UNUSED(point);
319
320 throw std::runtime_error ("The function 'isPointInside' is not implemented yet");
321
322 return false;
323}
324
336long VolUnstructured::locatePoint(const std::array<double, 3> &point) const
337{
338 BITPIT_UNUSED(point);
339
340 throw std::runtime_error ("The function 'locatePoint' is not implemented yet");
341
342 return Cell::NULL_ID;
343}
